rooms.description: Spacious entry area with a foyer that sets a Scandinavian minimalist aesthetic.
Large open living space featuring natural light and Scandinavian design elements.
Modern dining area with minimalist decor in line with Scandinavian style.
Private guest bedroom with efficient space planning and clean lines.
Dedicated home office designed for functionality and Scandinavian simplicity, with ample storage and workspace area.

openings.description: Large front door with a minimalist design and energy-efficient glazing.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light.
Large windows providing morning sunlight and enhancing the Scandinavian aesthetic.
Small balcony for fresh air and a connection to nature.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom that features calming Scandinavian decor.
Efficient secondary bedroom designed for simplicity and functionality.
Well-appointed en-suite bathroom with minimalist fixtures, located near the master bedroom.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring privacy and natural light.
Private balcony for fresh air with a Scandinavian aesthetic.
